## Minimap Character Icon Rotates with Kart Direction

Minimap character icons will rotate based on the direction the kart is facing. Similar to how the searchlight/arrow rotates to point in the kartâ€™s direction, the same behavior will apply to the character icons.

<details>
<summary>NTSC-U</summary>

```powerpc
C27E1CA4 00000007
80030038 2C000000
4082000C 39800001
999C0005 899C0004

60000000 00000000

4E800420 00000000
```
</details>
